QUESTION: And in the morning, rising up a great while before day, he went out, and departed into a solitary place, and there prayed.
What therefore God hath joined together, let not man put asunder.
Therefore I say unto you, What things soever ye desire, when ye pray, believe that ye receive them, and ye shall have them.
Heaven and earth shall pass away: but my words shall not pass away.
And what I say unto you I say unto all, Watch.
And he said unto them, Go ye into all the world, and preach the gospel to every creature.
He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved; but he that believeth not shall be damned.
And these signs shall follow them that believ; In my name shall they cast out devils; they shall speak with new tongues;
They shall take up serpents; and if they drink any deadly thing, it shall not hurt them; they shall lay hands on the sick, and they shall recover.
